description: This file contains inline functions for converting context structures between AppGateway and App2AppProvider within the WPEFramework namespace, facilitating context translation for app communication.

methods.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::IApp2AppProvider::Context ConvertAppGatewayToProviderContext(const WPEFramework::Exchange::GatewayContext & src,const string & origin)
methods.description: Converts a GatewayContext to an IApp2AppProvider::Context, copying request and connection IDs, app ID, and setting the origin.

methods.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::GatewayContext ConvertProviderToAppGatewayContext(const WPEFramework::Exchange::IApp2AppProvider::Context & src)
methods.description: Converts an IApp2AppProvider::Context back to a GatewayContext, copying request ID, connection ID, and app ID.
